shortcuts.description: Close current instance of window
Close current instance of window
Visual Studio Code comes with a lot of features and settings that you can change to fit your needs. This keyboard shortcut makes it easier to get to the settings whenever necessary.
Visual Studio Code comes with a lot of features and settings that you can change to fit your needs. This keyboard shortcut makes it easier to get to the settings whenever necessary.
Cut the selected line into clipboard
Copy the selected line into clipboard
Copy the selected line into clipboard

A lot of times you might need to move a line from one position to another. Instead of copying or cutting and pasting the line into another position, this shortcut offers a faster solution. Just place the cursor on the line.

A lot of times you might need to move a line from one position to another. Instead of copying or cutting and pasting the line into another position, this shortcut offers a faster solution. Just place the cursor on the line.

What if you need to copy a line and paste it below or above? Instead of having to actually copy and paste the line, this shortcut duplicates the line either below or above it, based on the direction chosen with the arrows.

What if you need to copy a line and paste it below or above? Instead of having to actually copy and paste the line, this shortcut duplicates the line either below or above it, based on the direction chosen with the arrows.
Delete the current line
Delete the current line

Insert a line below the current line
Insert a line above the current line
Insert a line above the current line
Show search and replace and replace option
Find the next/previous instance of the selection
Find the next/previous instance of the selection

shortcuts.task: Select All Occurance of Find Match
shortcuts.description: If you are using the find feature to do certain modifications with all the find results, this keyboard shortcut allows you to select all the find results.

shortcuts.task: Select All Occurance of Find Match
shortcuts.description: If you are using the find feature to do certain modifications with all the find results, this keyboard shortcut allows you to select all the find results.

shortcuts.task: Add selection to next Find Match
shortcuts.description: Selects the word at the cursor, or the next occurrence of the current selection.

shortcuts.task: Add selection to next Find Match
shortcuts.description: Selects the word at the cursor, or the next occurrence of the current selection.

shortcuts.task: Move last selection to next Find match
shortcuts.description: The Move Last Selection To Next Find Match command in VS Code moves the current selection to the next instance of the selected text.

shortcuts.task: Move last selection to next Find match
shortcuts.description: The Move Last Selection To Next Find Match command in VS Code moves the current selection to the next instance of the selected text.
This keyboard shortcut allows you to insert an additional cursor at any point in the file.
This keyboard shortcut allows you to insert an additional cursor at any point in the file.
Insert cursor above or below each of the current cursor positions.
Insert cursor above or below each of the current cursor positions.

What if you inserted a cursor by mistake, or realized later that you do not want to insert the cursor at that position anymore? This keyboard shortcut allows you to undo the last cursor insert. This is very helpful when you’ve inserted multiple cursors, as it allows you to keep the others in place and just removes the last inserted one.

What if you inserted a cursor by mistake, or realized later that you do not want to insert the cursor at that position anymore? This keyboard shortcut allows you to undo the last cursor insert. This is very helpful when you’ve inserted multiple cursors, as it allows you to keep the others in place and just removes the last inserted one.

shortcuts.task: Insert cursor at end of each line selected
shortcuts.description: Insert the cursor at the end of a highlighted selection.

shortcuts.task: Insert cursor at end of each line selected
shortcuts.description: Insert the cursor at the end of a highlighted selection.
A lot of times you need to select the entire current line your cursor is at. This keyboard shortcut makes it very simple.
A lot of times you need to select the entire current line your cursor is at. This keyboard shortcut makes it very simple.

shortcuts.task: Select all occurances of current seletion
shortcuts.description: With this keyboard shortcut, all you need is to have one occurrence of the text you’re looking for in the file selected. Then, by pressing the keys of the shortcut, you will select all its occurrences in the file.

shortcuts.task: Select all occurances of current seletion
shortcuts.description: With this keyboard shortcut, all you need is to have one occurrence of the text you’re looking for in the file selected. Then, by pressing the keys of the shortcut, you will select all its occurrences in the file.

shortcuts.task: Select all occurances of current word
shortcuts.description: This keyboard shortcut allows you to do the same as the previous one, but without having anything selected. While the cursor is placed on a word, you can press the keys of this shortcut and the current word with all of its occurrences in the current file will be selected.

shortcuts.task: Select all occurances of current word
shortcuts.description: This keyboard shortcut allows you to do the same as the previous one, but without having anything selected. While the cursor is placed on a word, you can press the keys of this shortcut and the current word with all of its occurrences in the current file will be selected.
With this keyboard shortcut, you can easily open the command palette. The command palette allows you to search and replace through the commands you can use and execute them.
With this keyboard shortcut, you can easily open the command palette. The command palette allows you to search and replace through the commands you can use and execute them.
Enable keyboard shortcut sequence

Open new instance of Visual Studio Code editor in new window
Open new instance of Visual Studio Code editor in new window

shortcuts.decriptions: search and replaceing for a specific file, especially as the project gets larger, can chew up a lot of time. Even if you already know where the file is, it’s definitely handy to learn this keyboard shortcut to easily open files in your project.
